tool_description: Get Premium signals from pro crypto traders
name: Crypto Trading - Signals
title: Crypto Trading - Signals

api_list.name: get all signals
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-trading-signals.p.rapidapi.com/get_signals.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-trading-signals.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests
